title: Open Channel Management - Spillway
description: This entity contains a harmonised desctiption for a generic Spillway made for Open Channel Management (raw-water systems)

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be Spillway

spillwayType.description: Property. The type of the spillway. Enum:'Broad-Crested, Ogee, Sharp-Crested, Specified Spillway'. In the case of 'Specified Spillway' only 'elevation (m) â€“ discharge (m3/s)' curve is required

crestElevation.description: Property. The crest elevation of the Spillway. Required only for 'Broad-Crested', 'Ogee' and 'Sharp-Crested'. Units:'meters'.

crestLength.description: Property. The length of the Spillway equals to the total length through which water passes. Required only for 'Broad-Crested', 'Ogee' and 'Sharp-Crested'. Units:'meters'.

spillwayWidth.description: Property. The width of the spillway (m). Only for 'Broad-Crested' type. Units:'meters'

numberAbutments.description: Property. The number of abutments of an ogee spillway. Only for 'Ogee' type

apronElevation.description: Property. The elevation at the bottom of the ogee spillway structure (P), just upstream of the spillway

apronLength.description: Property. The total length of the spillway bottom. Units:'meters'

dischargeCoefficient.description: Property. The discharge coefficient accounts for energy losses as water enters the spillway, flows through the spillway, and eventually exits the spillway. Units:'m^0.5/s'

designHead.description: Property. The total upstream energy head, measured above the spillway crest, for which the spillway is designed (Ho) for 'Ogee Spillway'. Units:'meters'

designDischarge.description: Property. The design discharge of the Spillway. Units: 'm^3/s'

designDischargeCoefficient.description: Property. The discharge coefficient (Co) for the design discharge (Ho)

maxFloodElevation.description: Property. The maximum elevation of water that can pass the spillway

controlCrossSection.description: Relationship. A relationship indicating the ID of the cross section that controls the flow over the Spillway

curveElevationDischarge.description: Relationship. A relationship pointing to the ID label of the curve that represents the water elevation as a function of discharge

curveDischargeCoefficient.description: Relationship. A relationship pointing to the ID label of the curve that represents the discharge coefficient as a function of upstream head/depth and spillway geometry. For 'Broad-creasted' spillway, discharge coefficient as a function of upstream head over spillway width. For 'Ogee' spillway, C/Co over H/Ho.

curveDesignDischargeCoefficient.description: Relationship. A relationship pointing to the ID label of the curve that represents the design discharge coefficient as a function of apron Elevation over design upstream head. Only for 'Ogee' (Co over P/ Ho).
